text: Fusinus harfordii is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== The soft parts of living specimens give off a luminescent pinkish glow. ==Distribution== Hope Island, British Columbia to California. ==References== harfordii Category:Gastropods described in 1871
title: Fusinus harfordii
